features: 【Ergonomic Design】The ergonomic wrist support mouse pad and keyboard wrist rest pad is an exceptional product that provides comfort and protection to the wrist and elbow joints from all angles. Its adjustable design aligns with the principles of ergonomics and delivers a pleasant experience, regardless of whether the user prefers wrist or elbow support for prolonged periods.

【High-Quality Materials】The material quality of this product is unparalleled, with memory foam ensuring maximum comfort and reducing pressure points. The support frame and shaft are made of stainless steel and can withstand daily use up to 40 pounds and 50,000 rotations. Memory foam padding ensures that the mouse wrist pad retains its shape even with extended use.

【Unique Design & Perfect Gift】The ergonomic wrist support mouse pad and keyboard wrist rest pad is a versatile product that can rotate to provide optimal support for the wrist and arm. Its unique design makes it ideal for various scenarios, including prolonged mouse usage, computer keyboard typing, and PC gaming and drawing. This product is the perfect accessory for anyone who uses the computer and types frequently and an excellent gift for family, friends, and students.

【Reasonable Size & Easy to Use】The package comes with one of swivel wrist rests, each measuring L5.2 ” x W 2.8” x H3.6”. The product's ease of use is unparalleled, Suitable for desktop thickness between 0.4-2 inches. Just follow the video instructions to install. Improved installation method, can be disassembled and installed at any time.
【Better Service】The product's customer service is available 24/7, with a 30-day no-reason refund and a one-year warranty. In case of any queries, do not hesitate to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Excellent performance in various scenarios Suitable for gaming Extended use of PC equipment can cause damage to your elbows, especially when they're in contact with the hard surface of your desk. Fortunately, our wrist rest is designed to prevent such injuries and provide added support to your elbows. Suitable for painting When using a PC for drawing, hand fatigue can be a common issue. Fortunately, our wrist rest is designed to help relieve this fatigue and provide added support to your hand. Suitable for typing With its comfortable padding and ergonomic design, our wrist rest helps reduce the strain on your elbows while typing. It allows you to work for longer periods without experiencing discomfort or pain. Plus, with its ability to automatically fit your elbow, our wrist rest provides a customized and comfortable experience for each individual user. Suitable for working with a mouse Our wrist rest is not only useful when typing, but it also provides excellent support when using the mouse. It's the perfect solution for those who work on a computer for extended periods and want to protect their elbows and wrists from discomfort and pain.

Installation Notes step 1 Take out all accessories (large screws, small screws, metal washers, screwdrivers), align the large screws as shown in the picture, and screw in about half of the length to the right. step 2 Place the metal spacer on top of the large screw as shown in the picture. (Please note the orientation of the metal gasket) step 3 As shown in the picture, screw the small screw into the hole of the large screw and tighten it. step 4 After the assembly is completed, you can use the adjusting screws to install the wrist rest on the table, install it close to the edge of the table and tighten it to keep it from loosening.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got two... One for each forearm... Sweet!
reviews.reviewText: The COZYOCHY Ergonomic Keyboard Wrist Rest Pad,Mouse Pads Wrist Support,Rotatable Memory Foam Wrist Support Pad,Mouse Pad Wrist Support for Gaming, Office, Computer, PC Painting, Gaming 1PCS (Black) (1) arrived and I received a second one as well that I purchased to protect my other forearm from the edge of the desk. They are great save for one little issue. The edge of the desk is beveled outward and the devices don't fasten as tight to the edge as I would like. Asa a result they gradually work themselves loose and have to be re-positioned and tightened every now and then. No worry... the relief that these pads have effected is well worth the periodic effort of tightening them. 5 stars... Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars soft gel pad, but a little too tall and no padding for the desk
reviews.reviewText: I will start with the good parts. The gel pad is really nice and soft, and has a good texture to it, and rebounds quickly. It is also thick, so my wrist doesn't "bottom out" on the base. The base and clamping frame are made from a thick gauge stainless steel with spot welds to hold the base and pad to the clamp.The pad is connected to the base by a hinge (also stainless) which I though was odd until I realized the reason. This requires some assembly, and you have to screw the clamp pad to the adjusting screw through a hole in the clamp top (see photo for what I mean.) So you need to rotate the pad out of the way for that one thing, and otherwise the hinge is pointless. It's stiff to move, but it won't stay at an angle once you place your hand/wrist on it, so it's not for adjustment.Partially why I don't like this is that it seems too tall. If there wasn't a hinge it would be a little lower, since you could do away with the height of the hinge itself and the top part of the clamp. It may still be too tall though. Perhaps if you have a tall mouse this would be OK, but for my slim mouse it's just too tall and my wrist is bent awkwardly down.The final thing that bothered me is that there is no padding at all on the clamp part. I'm not concerned about the clamp under the desk, but for the top of the desk I would want some kind of thin rubber pad to protect the finish. Of course that would make it even taller, lol. For testing, I put my mouse pad under the clamp, and perhaps that's a good solution for some people.I'll give 4 stars because it is well made, and might work well for some people, but I think it is a strange design choice to have that hinge there just for the one time purpose of assembly. Instead of the hinge, they should just ship it with a right angle screwdriver and do away with the hinge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work for me
reviews.reviewText: This would probably work great on the right type of desk. Mine has a lip around the edge so I could not get it to attach. The cushion is soft and I feel like if I could have attached it it would have given good support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish it worked for beveled edges!
reviews.reviewText: Pros:1) ergonomic and comfortable. It really did relax my wrist. I didn't feel any wrist pain at all.2) Easy installation. Just place, tighten and - that's it!3) Easy to clean. I just vacuum it when I get dust or debris on it and it's good to go.4) Easy to relocate but would be annoying it you're relocating every 20 minutes.Cons:1) Although they do state it in the product description, I just wish they had a system that worked for beveled edges. I didn't count against the product rating because it fairly stated. However, it would be nice as a lot of desks nowadays have various types of edges.2) If you tighten too much, it will leave an indentation on the underside of the desk. It could do with a polymer to leave a mark instead of an indentation.Overall 4.5/5.0:It's a good product. If my desk wasn't beveled everywhere else, I probably would have gotten another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars COZYOCHY Ergonomic Keyboard Wrist Rest Review
reviews.reviewText: I want to first start this review by saying I received this item for free but that this does not affect my review or opinion of the item.This wrist rest is a great addition to my small desk. This rest provides great support for my wrist while using my mouse. I am only concerned with the possible damage to my desk after a long period, I feel like it may damage my desk over time since there is a small bit of movement when leaning on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wrist rest pads
reviews.reviewText: I love these wristrest pads. The gel cushions are very soft and comfortable. The bottom of the pad is metal, and since I didn't want to scratch my desk from this pad sliding around, I glued some rubber pads. The rubber provided some grip and is now securely attached to my desk. I ended up getting another (2 pack).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this to use as an elbow rest while painting minis. same concept as a wrist wrest you would use at a keyboard but fixed position, raised and hopefully a little more resilient. In that regard its perfect. It attached easily to my desk, takes a fair amount of abuse while staying still, and provides support and comfort while i work. I do i wish the ring that holds it to the bottom was padded so it would be nicer to my desk, i found some small squishy thing that mostly does the trick but would have appreciated it included. I also find it tilts way to easily, i actually ended up sticking it just a little bit in the corner part of my desk so the other side of the L literally prevents it form being able to drop to the front. This was necessary as it kept slipping away and taking my elbow with it. All in all, as an elbow rest im happy with it. IF i were to be using this for my wrists for either my keyboard or mouse i feel like it would be a little too high and a little too firm. Perfect for my needs, may not be the same for yours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Didn't know I'd like this that much!
reviews.reviewText: I've been looking for a solution to help support my wrist while at my desk and this came up. I didn't think it'd be as comfortable as it is! Set up is super easy and my wrist feels so supported. The quality is alright, but I expect it to last a pretty long time with typical desk usage. It's a nice solution to a comfort problem that's been bugging me for a while.
